scripts.dev: docker run -p 1234:1234 -p 1235:1235 -v `pwd`:/home/node/app -w='/home/node/app' node:lts npm run docker:dev
scripts.build: docker run -v `pwd`:/home/node/app -w='/home/node/app' node:lts npm run docker:build
scripts.docker:build: npm run clean && rm -rf docs && parcel build ./src/index.html -d docs && cp ./src/CNAME ./docs/ && cp ./src/assets/stephen-sprinkle-resume.pdf ./docs/
